Subject: Upgrade to 800 Mbps High-Speed Internet for Only AED 279/Month!
--------------------------------------------------
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن


HELLO, DEAR Customer

 

I hope this message finds you well.  

 

My name is Tim and I am an authorized sales agent for Du. It is to inform you that your Home Internet WiFi charges dropped down, I’m excited to share an exclusive home internet package with a **40% discount* tailored just for you  

 

Here’s what the offer includes:  

 

Discounted Rate: AED 257/month for the first 6 months, then AED 429/month.  

Blazing-Fast Internet: 800mbps with unlimited usage.

Complimentary WiFi Upgrade: A new high-performance router for seamless connectivity.  

Additional Perks: A premium TV package and a phone line at no extra cost.  

 

This is a great opportunity to increase your home internet speed from 250 to 1000Mbps your costs, and enjoy enhanced services.
